text: Matteo Renzi (; born 11 January 1975) is an Italian politician. He was the 56th Prime Minister of Italy. He became Prime Minister on 22 February 2014. Before, he was the President of Florence Province from 2004 to 2009 and the Mayor of Florence from 2009 to 2014. He resigned on 5 December 2016. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website of the Presidency of the Council of Ministers *Renzi's personal website *Renzi on his party's website Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Italian mayors Category:Politicians from Florence Category:Prime ministers of Italy
title: Matteo Renzi
